name: io.github.K1ta141k/mcp-bench-router
title: MCP Bench Router
description: Routes design tasks to designarena.ai's current top-ranked model via OpenRouter. Live leaderboard rankings, automatic best-model selection, and direct model querying across 14 design categories.

environmentVariables.name: OPENROUTER_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: OpenRouter API key for query_design_model and query_specific_model tools. Get one at https://openrouter.ai/keys
